lead_paragraph: The unpublished “Tale of Kitty-in-Boots,” which was recovered from Ms. Potter’s archives in London, will be released this fall by Penguin Random House .

headline.print_headline: Lost Beatrix Potter Text, Starring a Rebellious Cat
headline.main: Beatrix Potter Manuscript About a Cat With a Double Life Is Found

snippet: The unpublished “Tale of Kitty-in-Boots,” which was recovered from Ms. Potter’s archives in London, will be released this fall by Penguin Random House .
abstract: Previously unknown Beatrix Potter story The Tale of Kitty-in-Boots, which was discovered in Potter archives at Victoria and Albert Museum in London, will be published by Frederick Warne & Company, imprint of Penguin Young Readers.
